casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Deandre TAYLOR. No. 388P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 25, 2008. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Taylor. David Saacks, District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 664 S.E.2d 375 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of August 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of August 2008."
